item.title: Child care in the Capitol: As more mothers run for office, some are bringing their kids
item.description: When Florida state Rep. Fiona McFarland's infant daughter, Grace Melton, crawled for the first time, the mom of four was right next door, hard at work...

item.title: U.S. economy contracted in first quarter, fueling recession concerns
item.description: The U.S. economy shrank in the first quarter of the year, a sign that President Trump's tariffs are starting to impact businesses.

item.title: Trump says he 'could' get Kilmar Abrego Garcia back from El Salvador prison
item.description: President Trump said he could get Kilmar Abrego Garcia back from a Salvadoran prison if he were a "gentleman."

item.title: Trump says 'great times' are ahead for U.S.
item.description: President Trump said Americans should've expected the chaos that has come from his tariffs and the upheaval of the economy.

item.title: The government introduces a new policy for terminating international students' legal status
item.description: The U.S. government has begun shedding new light on a crackdown on international students, spelling out how it targeted thousands of people and laying...
